title: Join the Corner Protest
description: Join us for a recurring protest every Tuesday and Thursday promoting positive engagement and democracy at the SW Corner of Drake and College in Fort Collins.
address: 2601 S College Ave, Fort Collins, CO
meeting_location: SW Corner of Drake and College in Fort Collins
raw_text:
Join the Corner Protest every Tuesday and Thursday 3:15-5:15 PM  
SW Corner of Drake and College in Fort Collins  
Positive engagement  
PROTECT DEMOCRACY  
Right or Left ... we all know this is WRONG!  
WE THE PEOPLE  
OMG GOP WTF  
Tuesday, November 25, 2025  
3:15 - 5:15 pm  
2601 S College Ave, Fort Collins, CO
raw_summary: The image describes a recurring protest happening every Tuesday and Thursday from 3:15 PM to 5:15 PM at the SW corner of Drake and College in Fort Collins. The flyer promotes positive engagement and includes phrases like "Protect Democracy" and "We the People." It specifically mentions the upcoming protest on Tuesday, November 25, 2025.

title: Olympia Visibility Brigade Overpass Bannering
description: Join us for a high-visibility protest on the bridge with signs and flags to stand up for democracy.
raw_text:
OLYMPIA VISIBILITY BRIGADE
OVERPASS BANNERING

29 NOVEMBER 2025
FROM 12:00 TO 2:00
EASTSIDE ST / I-5
EAST OLYMPIA

BRING YOUR HIGH-VISIBILITY PROTEST SIGNS, FLAGS, & A GOOD MOOD, AND JOIN US ON THE BRIDGE TO MAKE GOOD TROUBLE!

DEMOCRACY IS UNDER ATTACK STAND UP FIGHT BACK!

MORE INFORMATION: OLYMPIA INDIVISIBLE, BACKBONECAMPAIGN.ORG, AND THEBLOP.ORG
raw_summary: An event titled "Olympia Visibility Brigade Overpass Bannering" is scheduled for November 29, 2025, from 12:00 PM to 2:00 PM. The location is Eastside St / I-5 in East Olympia. The event invites participants to bring protest signs, flags, and a good mood to join a protest for democracy. More information is available through Olympia Indivisible, BackboneCampaign.org, and TheBlop.org.

title: Peaceful Protest for Children of Gaza
description: Join us in Loveland for a peaceful protest to stand in solidarity with the Palestinian people on the International Day of Solidarity. Create a picture that represents hope and innocence to bring to the event. Wear black in mourning.
raw_text:
Join Us In Loveland, CO at Veterans Park

12 to 2PM November 29th

The Children of Gaza and all over the world have been innocent victims of crimes perpetrated by adults by war, hate, and abuse. Children and their children are the inherents of the future. Let’s reclaim that promise for them through a peaceful and healing protest.

November 29th is the International Day of Solidarity with the Palestinian people. Since October 2023 the number of Palestinian children killed has surpassed 20,000 (as of 9/6/2025). Please wear black in mourning.

In honor of World Children’s Day Nov. 20th, please create a picture that you will hold at the protest. The picture should signify or symbolize a feeling of hope, and/or innocence, and/or the promises of what childhood should be…
raw_summary: The flyer announces a peaceful protest in Loveland, CO at Veterans Park on November 29th from 12 to 2 PM. It is held in solidarity with Palestinian people, coinciding with the International Day of Solidarity. Participants are encouraged to create a picture representing hope or innocence to hold at the protest. Wearing black is suggested for mourning.

title: Peaceful Rally at Washington Square Park
description: We gather to end the unlawful occupation of Palestinian territories and to celebrate the International Day of Solidarity with the Palestinian People. Join us for a peaceful rally.
raw_text: WASHINGTON SQUARE PARK 2:00PM NOVEMBER 29TH END THE UNLAWFUL OCCUPATION OF THE PALESTINIAN TERRITORY! Celebrate International Day of Solidarity with the Palestinian People! PEACEFUL RALLY! Background heavily inspired by an unknown Gaza artist
raw_summary: A peaceful rally event at Washington Square Park on November 29th at 2:00 PM, focusing on ending the occupation of Palestinian territories and celebrating the International Day of Solidarity with Palestinian People.

title: Peaceful Protest for Children of Gaza
description: Join us in a peaceful protest to reclaim the promise of the future for children affected by conflict. Wear black in mourning and participate by creating pictures symbolizing hope and innocence.
raw_text:
Join Us In Loveland, CO at Veterans Park
12 to 2PM November 29th

The Children of Gaza and all over the world have been innocent victims of crimes perpetrated by adults by war, hate, and abuse. Children and their children are the inherents of the future. Let's reclaim that promise for them through a peaceful and healing protest.

November 29th is the International Day of Solidarity with the Palestinian people. Since October 2023 the number of Palestinian children killed has surpassed 20,000 (as of 9/6/2025). Please wear black in mourning.

In honor of World Children's Day, Nov. 20th, please create a picture that you will hold at the protest. The picture should signify or symbolize a feeling of hope, and/or innocence, and/or the promises of what childhood should be...
raw_summary: The image is an event flyer inviting people to join a peaceful protest in Loveland, CO, at Veterans Park on November 29th from 12 to 2 PM. The event aims to honor children in conflict zones, emphasizing solidarity with Palestinian children. Participants are encouraged to wear black in mourning and create a picture symbolizing hope or innocence for World Children’s Day on November 20th.

title: Shine with Pride
description: Join us as we speak out against conversion camps. This event aims to raise awareness and support for change. Organized by People for Change Utah.
raw_text:
Shine with Pride

SPEAK OUT AGAINST CONVERSION CAMPS!
DECEMBER 13TH, 12 PM-2 PM, AT THE UTAH CAPITOL

Held by People for Change Utah
